page.title: 09LIFESTYLE _ EXTRACTS N'CLE
page.content: I get up at 7 on Sunday morning, watch TV,then have my breakfast.I go to church and Sunday School and after dinner play out on the building site. I go to bed at 9pm(Girl,9yrs,Hebburn) At home we play football up the field and cricket...hide_and_seek.Then I go in at 9.25 to watch 'Miami Vice' and go to bed at 10.20. (Boy,9yrs,Walker_ gate). I like taking my young son out for walks,going to the shops,going out with friends,reading,knitting and wine_making.(Female resident, Walker_ gate). I have been burgled 3 times in 3 years,once in the house and twice in the shop.(Shopkeeper,Walkergate). I spend hours on my allotment.(Male resident, Walkergate).
